## getExistenceProof() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates an ICS23 compliant existence proof.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getExistenceProof(tree: Tree, key: Buffer): ics23.IExistenceProof;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tree | [Tree](./iavl.tree.md) | The tree for which a proof should be created. |
|  key | Buffer | The key that is supposed to exist in the tree. |

<b>Returns:</b>

ics23.IExistenceProof

An existence proof.
